column1: obituary for: robert m. daniels| robert m. daniels
column6: at john f kennedy medical center in edison. robert was born in elizabeth
column8: he has resided in edison for the last 40 years. robert was a sprinkler fitter for 36 years
column9: working for national automatic sprinkler. he was a member of the plumbers and pipefitters of us and canada association; he was also a member of the italian american club and father and son american legion post in edison. robert was predeceased by his daughter
column10: maryann. robert is survived by his wife of 24 years
column13: taylor bay. funeral services will be at 10:00 a. m. on friday
column17: followed by a 10:30 mass at guardian angels r. c. church in edison
column18: interment will be at rosedale cemetery in linden. family and friends may visit on thursday
column20: from 2:00 to 4:00 and 7:00 to 9:00 p. m. at the funeral home.
